post.description: Webhook is a place holder to describe webhook response in swagger.
post.summary: Webhook is a place holder to describe webhook response in swagger.

account_id.description: account_id is the account associated to webhook

from_id.description: from_id if provided, original trigger of the event

to_id.description: to_id if provided, final destination of the event

key.description:
Key is either hex encoded 32 byte ID or string label.
String label is used as a preimage to sha256 for 32 byte hash.

document_id.description: if provided, creates the next version of the document.

payload.description: payload to be signed in hex
